section_hero.title: Multiplatform Messaging, Trackers Not Included.
section_hero.description: Satellite gives you peace of mind with end-to-end encryption without sacrificing quality.

description.one: Satellite is built using serverless technology with peer 2 peer workflows. Everything is encrypted so your data only gets read by who you intend it to. We store files on a distributed network so redundancy comes built in along with large file storage.
description.two: All these things come without compromises to your experience.

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform
multi_platform.description: Chat from anywhere, from desktop and beyond Satellite has you covered. Satellite is also built to be offline-first so whether you have a good connection or not you can be sure you get your message out there! Our mobile app installs as a PWA during Early Access so setup is quick, and you get updates immediately.

chat.title: Multi Platform chat
chat.description: Chat anywhere with our cross platform app.

sharing.title: Easy File sharing
sharing.description: Share up to 10GB files instantly with friends.

serverless.title: Serverless
serverless.description: Your data goes straight to your friends, nobody tracking in the middle.

description.one: Satellite is nearing our early access beta! If you'd like to get started ahead of the curve you can join our mailing list and get notified of releases. You can give Satellite a try right now but expect some bugs and please understand it is not representative of our final product.
description.two: Satellite installs as a PWA which makes it very easy to get started, just navigate to https://app.satellite.im on your phone to get started.

section_team.title: Our Team
section_team.description: Satellite is full of passionate open-source developers as well as our in house team which both work hard to build a different kind of chat platform.
